mems.content: Lifecycle compact trace: User chose to start new task (option 2). Archived previous remediation trajectory for potential future reference.

Lifecycle compact trace: Completed marketing canvas and 19-slide presentation for Sữa Ông Thọ Tết 2026 campaign. Files saved: marketing-canvas-sua-ong-tho-tet-2026-02-19.md and presentation-sua-ong-tho-tet-2026-02-19.md

Lifecycle compact trace: Created market-research-framework skill (Technique type) covering Consumer Research, Market Sizing, and Trend Analysis. Bilingual (EN/VI), includes data validation tiers, TAM/SAM/SOM formulas, sample size guidelines, and evidence discipline rules.

Root Cause: HiveFiver journey contracts show boundary and schema normalization gaps under stress. Symptoms: todo.updated camelCase fields are dropped, action-level session updates create unbounded graph tasks, and event-handler hook writes tasks manifest directly (CQRS leak). Verification: code evidence in src/hooks/event-handler.ts, src/tools/hivemind-session.ts, src/lib/graph-io.ts plus runtime scratch simulation via npx tsx showing field-loss behavior. Files Changed: none (read-only audit).
